Issues.Title: ComboBox raises selection property change even though it does not support the selection provider.
Issues.Body:
ComboBox AccessibleObject [raises](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/main/src/System.Windows.Forms/src/System/Windows/Forms/ComboBox.ComboBoxAccessibleObject.cs#:~:text=%7D-,internal%20void%20SetComboBoxItemSelection(),%7D,-internal%20override%20void) [ElementSelected property change event](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-implementingselectionitem), however this control does not support the [SelectionProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/uiautomationcore/nn-uiautomationcore-iselectionitemprovider). 
[Docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-implementingselectionitem) specify this event/provider combination as required.

*Result:*
Accessibility clients don't listen to events associated with this provider. Specifically, NVDA does not listen to it, resulting in compliance issue in VS property pages.

We can't remove this event because other clients are likely to rely on it. However, we can implement the missing pattern.

The same issue is present on .NET Framework 481
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ComboBox raises selection property change even though it does not support the selection provider." (#7764)

Issues.Title: ComboBox supports Value UIA pattern, however, does not raise the property change event for value property
Issues.Body:
According to the required events section in [docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-supportcomboboxcontroltype). 

<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

UIA_ValueValuePropertyId property-changed event. | If the control supports the Value control pattern, it must support this event.
-- | --


<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

[UIA_ValueValuePropertyId](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-control-pattern-propids) property-changed event(UIA_AutomationPropertyChangedEventId) should be [raised](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/f7859b239890dfdf55b728c381f92972ceb7f560/src/System.Windows.Forms/src/System/Windows/Forms/AccessibleObject.cs#L2156) for [UIA_ValueValuePropertyId](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-control-pattern-propids) because ComboBox [supports](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/main/src/System.Windows.Forms/src/System/Windows/Forms/ComboBox.ComboBoxAccessibleObject.cs) the [Value](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-implementingvalue) control pattern.

The same issue exists in .NET Framework 481. However VS had implemented a workaround - https://github.com/dotnet/project-system/compare/main...adamint:project-system:dev/adamint/legacy-prop-page-accessibility-fixes-august

Customer impact:

VS is hitting this issue in NVDA in property pages on 481. Narrator is handling lack of this property changed event by listening to property changed event for `UIA_SelectionItem_ElementSelectedEventId`. NVDA does not listed to that event and is not updated properly per Roberto Perez investigation.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ComboBox supports Value UIA pattern, however, does not raise the property change event for value property" (#7763)

Issues.Title: ComboBox control with DropDownList style should not support Value UIA pattern
Issues.Body:
ComboBox controls are required to provide Value pattern ([IValueProvider](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/api/UIAutomationCore/nn-uiautomationcore-ivalueprovider))	 only if the end user can add arbitrary values according to [documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/winauto/uiauto-supportcomboboxcontroltype). 

<html>
<body>
<!--StartFragment-->

IValueProvider | Depends | If the combo box can take arbitrary text values, the Value control pattern must be supported. This pattern enables the string contents of the combo box to be set programmatically. If the Value control pattern is not supported, the user must select from the list items within the subtree of the combo box.
-- | -- | --


<!--EndFragment-->
</body>
</html>

However we [support](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/main/src/System.Windows.Forms/src/System/Windows/Forms/ComboBox.ComboBoxAccessibleObject.cs#:~:text=%7D-,internal%20override%20bool%20IsPatternSupported(UiaCore.UIA%20patternId),%7D,-return%20base) this pattern unconditionally.

As a result, user will be tempted to enter an arbitrary value into the accessibility tools, will get a success result code but the desired value will not be assigned.
The below screenshot reflects inspect experience with the WinformsControlsApp:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15823268/189775137-71001d44-ff91-44eb-bb2a-67d2409c95fb.png)

The text value entered(via Actions->Value.SetValue) is not available among the DropDownList values. and is not displayed in the combo's edit box, yet inspect reports success. 

The same problem exists on .NET Framework 481
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "ComboBox control with DropDownList style should not support Value UIA pattern" (#7762)

Issues.Title: Faulting module name: coreclr.dll
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

new6.0-windows

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

6.0.422.16404 didn't work either.

### Issue description

My application that is supposed to run 24/7 regularly crashes. This is what I see in event viewer:

```
Faulting application name: xx.exe, version: 1.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x62cf0990
Faulting module name: coreclr.dll, version: 6.0.822.36306, time stamp: 0x62cf0045
Exception code: 0xc0000005
Fault offset: 0x00000000001d1fdd
Faulting process id: 0x3ed8
Faulting application start time: 0x01d8c47bc2e2313a
Faulting application path: C:\Data\xx.exe
Faulting module path: C:\Program Files\dotnet\shared\Microsoft.NETCore.App\6.0.8\coreclr.dll
Report Id: 525e6274-83f7-4540-8f3a-471a6655e70a
Faulting package full name: 
Faulting package-relative application ID: 
```

### Steps to reproduce

I have a large project. The program crashes very iregularly - sometimes every like 10 mintes other times it may run for a week without a single crash. Hence, I don't know what exactly causes the crash. Can you advise how to proceed?
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Faulting module name: coreclr.dll" (#7757)

Issues.Title: Everytime I create a new project the designer breaks
Issues.Body:
### Environment

Visual Studio 2022 17.3.3

### .NET version

I use NET 6.0, but it also affected 3.1 & 5.0.

### Did this work in a previous version of Visual Studio and/or previous .NET release?

It did work in the past, but suddenly i just get this error that breaks the form designer.

### Issue description

In every project I create, the form designer just doesnt work.
This is the error it gives me:

```
at Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.Host.ProjectInfoProvider.NetCore.d__6.MoveNext()
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
at Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.Host.ProjectInfoProvider.d__9.MoveNext()
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
at Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.Host.ServerHostFactory.d__8.MoveNext()
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
at Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.DesignToolsClientLoader.d__29.MoveNext()
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
at Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.DesignToolsClientLoader.<>c__DisplayClass25_1.<<-ctor>b__1>d.MoveNext()
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.TaskAwaiter.HandleNonSuccessAndDebuggerNotification(Task task)
at Microsoft.DotNet.DesignTools.Client.DesignToolsClientLoader.d__27.MoveNext() 
```

### Steps to reproduce

Create any WinForms project, doesnt matter if its NET 3.1, 5.0 or 6.0.

### Diagnostics

_No response_
![Screenshot (75)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/107318006/189385781-90266a43-95f6-4d78-b104-c5ce6a114e92.png)

Issues.Title: [Servicing] Fixing "Collection was modified ..." exception while MonthCalendar AO tree rebuilding
Issues.Body:
Fixes https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/issues/7714
.NET 8.0 PR #7738

The reason of the bug was calling RebuildAccessibilityTree 2 times at the same time via CalendarViewChanged and DisplayRangeChanged events.
Removed CalendarViewChanged event using because it duplicates the work of DisplayRangeChanged and leads to the exception. We release elements the first rebuilding time and catch the exception while the second call.

## Servicing reasons

- The regression breaks accessibility work of `MonthCalendar` in .NET 7.0 only after [#7362](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7362) and [#7569](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7569)

## Proposed changes

- Remove extra `CalendarViewChanged` usage
- Remove extra cleaning methods that duplicate disconnection methods work

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- There is no the exception while using Narrator with MonthCalendar


## Regression? 

- Yes ([#7362](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7362) and [#7569](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7569) exposed the problem in [#4758](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/4758))

## Risk

- Minimal

## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- CTI
- Manual testing

## Accessibility testing  <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

- Using Narrator and AI


## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- .NET 7.0
- Windows 11

Issues.Title: Got an exception when a TextBlock got focus: `System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException:“Argument_CultureNotSupportedInInvariantMode Arg_ParamName_Name, culture Argument_CultureInvalidIdentifier, 2052 (0x0804)”`
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

 Version:   6.0.303
 Commit:    7494fee64a

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

I don't know how to switch a wpf project target SDK.

### Issue description

My code works well when I build it for debug, but not working in release mode.

There are two textblock in this window, and the exception will be throwed when I click any textblock. But  the exception will NOT be throwed in debug build mode.

```log
System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException:“Argument_CultureNotSupportedInInvariantMode Arg_ParamName_Name, culture Argument_CultureInvalidIdentifier, 2052 (0x0804)”
```
```xml
<Window x:Class="Logistical.QueueManagementClient.Forms.LoginWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"
        xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006"
        xmlns:local="clr-namespace:Logistical.QueueManagementClient"
        mc:Ignorable="d"
        Closing="Window_Closing"
        Title="登录" Height="573" Width="978">
    <Window.Resources>
        <!--依赖属性 本页面用的样式-->
        <Style TargetType="Button">
            <Setter Property="Background" Value="Gold"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="20"></Setter>
        </Style>
    </Window.Resources>
    <Grid >
        <!--定义行 2行 比例59:361-->
        <Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <RowDefinition Height="2*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="3*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="1*"/>
        </Grid.RowDefinitions>
        <!--定义列 2列 比例51:208-->
        <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="55*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
        </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
        <!--在第一行，第二列写入一个按钮 
        Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" 是索引 
        Grid.Row="0"表示第一行
        Grid.Column="1"  表示第二列-->
        <StackPanel  Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
            <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="用户名" Width="60"/>
                <TextBox x:Name="user"  Text="admin" Width="200"/>
            </StackPanel>
            <StackPanel  Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="密    码" Width="60"/>
                <PasswordBox  x:Name="password" Width="200" />
            </StackPanel>
            <Button x:Name="loginBtn" Margin="22" Height="30" Background="{x:Null}" Content="登录" Click="LoginBtn_ClickAsync"/>
        </StackPanel>
    </Grid>
</Window>
```

### Steps to reproduce

```xml
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">

	<PropertyGroup>
		<RuntimeIdentifier>win-x64</RuntimeIdentifier>
		<OutputType>WinExe</OutputType>
		<TargetFramework>net6.0-windows</TargetFramework>
		<Nullable>enable</Nullable>
		<UseWPF>true</UseWPF>
		<SelfContained>true</SelfContained>
		<PublishSingleFile>false</PublishSingleFile>
	</PropertyGroup>

	<ItemGroup>
		<PackageReference Include="System.Text.Json" Version="6.0.2" />
		<PackageReference Include="System.Text.Encoding.CodePages" Version="6.0.0" />
	</ItemGroup>
	
</Project>
```
```xml
<Window x:Class="Logistical.QueueManagementClient.Forms.LoginWindow"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
        xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"
        xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006"
        xmlns:local="clr-namespace:Logistical.QueueManagementClient"
        mc:Ignorable="d"
        Closing="Window_Closing"
        Title="登录" Height="573" Width="978">
    <Window.Resources>
        <!--依赖属性 本页面用的样式-->
        <Style TargetType="Button">
            <Setter Property="Background" Value="Gold"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"></Setter>
            <Setter Property="FontSize" Value="20"></Setter>
        </Style>
    </Window.Resources>
    <Grid >
        <!--定义行 2行 比例59:361-->
        <Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <RowDefinition Height="2*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="3*"/>
            <RowDefinition Height="1*"/>
        </Grid.RowDefinitions>
        <!--定义列 2列 比例51:208-->
        <Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="55*"/>
            <ColumnDefinition Width="20*"/>
        </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
        <!--在第一行，第二列写入一个按钮 
        Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" 是索引 
        Grid.Row="0"表示第一行
        Grid.Column="1"  表示第二列-->
        <StackPanel  Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
            <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="用户名" Width="60"/>
                <TextBox x:Name="user"  Text="admin" Width="200"/>
            </StackPanel>
            <StackPanel  Orientation="Horizontal" Height="30">
                <Label  Content="密    码" Width="60"/>
                <PasswordBox  x:Name="password" Width="200" />
            </StackPanel>
            <Button x:Name="loginBtn" Margin="22" Height="30" Background="{x:Null}" Content="登录" Click="LoginBtn_ClickAsync"/>
        </StackPanel>
    </Grid>
</Window>
```

build it in release mode and click a textInput area, and it will crash.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Got an exception when a TextBlock got focus: `System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException:“Argument_CultureNotSupportedInInvariantMode Arg_ParamName_Name, culture Argument_CultureInvalidIdentifier, 2052 (0x0804)”`" (#7742)

Issues.Title: [HC] Menustrips' child control textbox borders are not visible
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

8.0.100-alpha.1.22451.15

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

No, it is not a regression issue

### Issue description

Cu**rrent Behavior:**
Menustrips' child control textbox borders are not visible
HC Aquatic theme:
![A6](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188589900-c1403e7c-40a4-4861-9c24-2d72744781f0.png)


HC Desert theme:
![A2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188589977-85983551-4492-4968-a120-1f9d6d4e2892.png)


HC Dusk theme:
![A3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188590019-bd145af5-e015-4a5f-8587-32e6e74b4dc7.png)


HC Night Sky theme:
![A4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188590061-826f1679-9a22-4701-838c-6dd7328102f6.png)


E**xpected Behavior:**
Menustrips' child control textbox borders can be seen
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/104609169/188532860-eb07a017-890c-4009-9156-97b772ca7875.png)





### Steps to reproduce

1. Turn on High Contrast theme in Windows settings
2. Create a WinForms .NET core project
3. Add MenuStrip control
4. Add child controls MenuItem, TextBox, ComboBox respectively
5. Ctrl+Shift+A add a Application Manifest File and uncomment windows 10
6. Build and run

**More Info:**

1. This issue is repro on all HC themes.
2. This issue is repro on framework project.

Issues.Title: Fixing "Collection was modified ..." exception while MonthCalendar AO tree rebuilding
Issues.Body:
Fixes #7714
Port to .NET 7.0 is PR #7739

The reason of the bug was calling `RebuildAccessibilityTree` 2 times at the same time via `CalendarViewChanged` and `DisplayRangeChanged` events.
Removed `CalendarViewChanged` event using because it duplicates the work of `DisplayRangeChanged` and leads to the exception. We release elements the first rebuilding time and catch the exception while the second call.

## Proposed changes 

- Remove extra `CalendarViewChanged` usage
- Remove extra cleaning methods that duplicate disconnection methods work

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- There is no the exception while using Narrator with MonthCalendar

## Regression? 

- Yes ([#7362](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7362) and [#7569](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/7569) exposed the problem in [#4758](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/4758))

## Risk

- Minimal

## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- CTI
- Manual testing

## Accessibility testing  <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

- Using Narrator and AI


## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- .NET 8.0
- Windows 11
